text: Hugh O'Leary (born 19 July 1974) is a British accountant who is the spouse of Liz Truss, who was the prime minister of the United Kingdom from September 2022 to November 2022. He ran multiple times for a seat in the city council of Greenwich, last being in 2006. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Spouses of prime ministers of the United Kingdom Category:Politicians from Merseyside Category:Conservative Party (UK) people Category:Politicians from London
title: Hugh O'Leary
